Usage¶

To use MPC Boilerplate in a project:

import mpc_boilerplate

Details on the Snell’s Law Function …

mpc_boilerplate.refraction.snell(theta_inc, n1, n2)[source]¶

Compute the refraction angle using Snell’s Law.

See https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Snell%27s_law

theta_inc : float
Incident angle in radians.
n1, n2 : float
The refractive index of medium of origin and destination medium.
theta : float
refraction angle

A ray enters an air–water boundary at 45 degrees. Compute exit angle.

>>> snell(np.deg2rad(45), 1.00, 1.33)
0.5605584137424605
